subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Matt Holliday’s two-run home run capped a three-run third inning and gave St. Louis a lead it would not relinquish and a 3-1 lead in the N.L.C.S. against the Dodgers.
snippet: Matt Holliday’s two-run home run capped a three-run third inning and gave St. Louis a lead it would not relinquish and a 3-1 lead in the N.L.C.S. against the Dodgers.
